name: Auto Phalanx 2000
description:
A single-player auto-chess where you need to recruit heroes to survive against waves of enemies.

The game has two phases, shop and battle.

In the shop, drag a card to your 'hand' to purchase it. Drag cards or units back to the shop to sell them.

You can upgrade the shop to gain more battlefield slots, and access to higher tier units.

You can see the next wave of enemies while shopping. Begin the battle to commit to your lineup.

Hit M to mute the music.

Created for TOJam 2021!
